name: Blood and Grenadine
description:
Created for Nokia 3310 Jam 3

Blood the Edgy and Grenadine the Winged are two best buddes/lovers who find themselves trapped in the Devil Dome, the home of the nefarious Doug DevilDome. The titular heroes must work together to overcome the Dome's various challenges escape and achieve their freedom. The player controls both Grenadine and Blood at the same time. They can walk, jump and climb, as well as use their own special abilities. Grenadine can  double jump to reach new heights while Blood can pull levers to use machinery.  Many perils await the duo in their journey, such as spikes, devils, ladders, and more! 

CONTROLS

• Grenadine

    J <-> L : Move Left/Right

   I : Jump/Climb Ladders/Double Jump(when mid-jump)

• Blood

 A <-> D : Move Left/Right

 W : Jump/Climb Ladders

S: Pull levers

Note: Don't get soft-locked on Stage 2. Please.

HOW TO WIN

To complete each level, the player must get both Grenadine and Blood to the exit door. 

 BUTTONS AND LEVERS

You will encounter various buttons and levers which trigger events as you travel through the Devil Dome. Both Grenadine and Blood can stand on buttons, but only Blood can pull levers. 

DEVILS

    The Devil Dome is home to the Devil Boys, a nasty gang of rebellious imps. Stay clear if you meet one: one touch will send Grenadine or Blood to their grave!

Created by Team Rhubarb
